landingPage.resumeText: I‚Äôm a passionate Full Stack Software Engineer who loves turning complex ideas into digital solutions. With a strong foundation in software development, I find joy in crafting systems that are both efficient and intuitive. Whether I‚Äôm diving into data engineering challenges or building dynamic web applications, my approach is fueled by curiosity and a drive to create meaningful impact. Beyond code, I see each project as a canvas to innovate and grow, embracing every opportunity to learn and contribute to the ever-evolving world of technology.

bigData.title: Big Data
bigData.contentText: I possess a deep understanding of data management, analysis, and visualization techniques, empowering organizations to derive actionable insights from vast and diverse datasets. Leveraging tools and platforms such as Hadoop, Spark, and Apache Kafka, I design and implement scalable data pipelines that efficiently process, transform, and analyze data in real-time.

softwareDevelopment.title: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.contentText: I am adept at conceptualizing, designing, and implementing software solutions that address complex business challenges. With proficiency in multiple programming languages such as Python, Java, and C++, I have developed a diverse range of applications, from enterprise-level systems to mobile apps, employing best practices in software engineering and agile methodologies throughout the development lifecycle.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.contentText: I specialize in crafting visually captivating websites with seamless functionality across platforms. Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, I create engaging user interfaces that leave a lasting impression. My expertise extends to back-end development using frameworks like SpringBoot and .NET, ensuring robust and scalable web applications tailored to client needs.

devOps.title: DevOps
devOps.contentText: Skilled in automating and integrating the processes between software development and IT operations. Proficient in CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes. Implements infrastructure as code, monitoring, and security practices to enhance collaboration and streamline deployments.

aboutMePage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I am a software engineer with a strong focus on full stack development and data analysis. Over the course of my career, I have built a solid foundation in programming, system design, and project management. My passion lies in creating impactful software solutions, tackling complex data engineering challenges, and building innovative web applications. Fueled by curiosity and a commitment to excellence, I continuously strive to learn, innovate, and contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving world of technology.

id_1.title: IoT_Traffic_Monitor
id_1.description: The Traffic Data Monitoring project leverages real-time IoT data from connected vehicles to monitor traffic on different routes. It consists of three standalone Maven applications written in Java: IoT Data Producer, IoT Data Processor, and IoT Data Dashboard. Each module serves a specific purpose in processing and presenting traffic data for analysis and visualization. The project utilizes Apache Kafka for message streaming, Spark Streaming for data processing, Cassandra for data storage, and Spring Boot for web application development.

id_2.title: StreamAggSync
id_2.description: StreamAggSync-master is an event-driven data processing system designed to interact in real-time with an online banking platform. This system consumes data from Kafka topics generated during the simulation of banking events within the banking environment. It leverages Spark Structured Streaming for efficient consumption of Kafka messages, intelligent aggregation, and storage of aggregated data in PostgreSQL databases. The project aims to facilitate real-time analysis and reliable storage of data from various Kafka topics, specifically within the domain of Banking Regulation and Risk Management.

id_3.title: Event-driven Banking Data Producer
id_3.description: The Event-driven Banking Data Producer is a Java-based application built with Spring Boot and Apache Kafka. It acts as a Kafka producer, generating data related to banking operations such as account information, customer details, account balances, and transactions. The application provides APIs for consuming and storing data in Kafka topics, dynamically creating topics for each model of data.

id_4.title: E-Commerce App with Microservices Architecture
id_4.description: The E-Commerce App is a scalable and resilient application built with a microservices architecture using Java Spring Boot. It consists of several modules including API Gateway, Discovery Service, Inventory Service, Notification Service utilizing Apache Kafka for asynchronous real-time data streaming and event management. The application ensures seamless communication between microservices and high availability using Netflix Eureka.

id_5.title: Bank Management System
id_5.description: The Bank Management System is a secure and efficient application designed to facilitate interactions between bank employees and clients within a banking environment. It is built on the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture using ASP.NET Core MVC with C# and Razor Pages. The system ensures robust security and authentication using ASP.NET Core Identity.

id_6.title: Cafe Management System - Backend
id_6.description: The backend of the Cafe Management System is built using Java and Spring Boot, providing robust functionalities for managing product categories, generating bills, and implementing secure authentication and authorization. It ensures efficient data handling and processing, catering to the needs of cafe owners or managers.

id_7.title: Cafe Management System - Frontend
id_7.description: The frontend of the Cafe Management System is built using Angular, providing an intuitive user interface for efficient product management and order processing. It offers a seamless experience for cafe owners or managers to interact with the system, facilitating easy navigation and access to key functionalities.

id_8.title: Search Engine App
id_8.description: The C++ Search Engine App is a comprehensive tool designed to index and search through multiple files efficiently. It consists of various components including a file reader, analyzer, statistics generator, indexer, scheduler, and search engine. This project aims at designing a search system to retrieve and display valuable search results from extensive documents, applying object-oriented programming to enhance code modularity, maintainability, and reusability.

id_9.title: BIO-INSPIRED ALGORITHMS
id_9.description: This research project focused on bio-inspired algorithms, exploring computational methods derived from natural processes such as evolution, swarm intelligence, and biological systems. The study examined techniques like genetic algorithms, particle swarm optimization, and ant colony optimization, applying them to solve complex optimization problems and demonstrating their potential in enhancing efficiency and adaptability in various domains.

id_10.title: Development of an Emotional State Recognition System Through Physiological Data Analysis and Machine Learning
id_10.description: This project involves developing a system that leverages physiological data, such as heart rate and skin conductance, to recognize emotional states. By applying machine learning algorithms, the system analyzes patterns in the data to classify emotions, aiming to improve human-computer interaction and provide insights into emotional well-being.
